name: Debugger (wdebowicz)
description:
Climb to the top before the red line or you will stuck in the infinite loop!

Game level was created literally from the game code.

Create your own levels by using the editor.

Controls:
A/D - left/right
W/Space - jump
W/Space [Hold] - long jump
ESC - quit
* To stuck to the wall hold A/D

* Recommended to play in a full screen.

Ludum dare entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/debugger
